text: Mimenicodes perroudi is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Montrouzier in 1861. It is known from New Caledonia.BioLib.cz - Mimenicodes perroudi. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1861
title: Mimenicodes perroudi
